text: Hey <!channel>, not sure when this falls into our workflow, but wanted to be sure we set up the appropriate timing for Do Not Disturb settings on system notifications. Had a ton of pop ups when I was using it yesterday.
we can definitely include that in the delivered documentation (onboarding for the curator/admin). We may also be able to do it with the other Kiosk Mode things we're considering

<!channel>: there's a build on the big planar with the background "screen" color updated to be black rather than that yellow/green pattern and the diagonal background pattern in place behind the images.   please take a look and let me know if that's what you guys were hoping for.
thanks, <@U0289USNA> will take a look after this call. <@U026E0ZNR>
I dig. Did scrolling get disabled again?
The planar glitched out and lost the scrolling
boo. i'd like to explore what we can do to recover from that

<@U0289USNA>, the grey BG looks great. There are a couple extra changes that need to be done now that i see it in person. We'll make Trello cards for them (change text, rule lines on BG to #cccccc, and some button alterations from me)

I've pushed my work today to origin/readingList (why am I still using that branch? oh well). Currently the slideshow has the wrong background color, despite trying to set it from IB *and* in code. But images don't overflow their bounds any more, which is good.
